name: prettier-plus
description: Pulsar plugin for formatting using prettier

debug.title: Debug Mode
debug.description: Log Prettier detection and resolution info to developer console.

enabled.title: Format Files on Save
enabled.description: Automatically format entire file when saving.

respectEslintignore.title: Respect `.eslintignore`
respectEslintignore.description: Skip files listed in `.eslintignore` when formatting on save.

showInStatusBar.title: Show in Status Bar
showInStatusBar.description: Show format-on-save status in the status bar.

excludedGlobs.title: Excluded Globs
excludedGlobs.description: Comma-separated list of file globs to exclude from formatting on save. Takes precedence over scopes.

whitelistedGlobs.title: Included Globs
whitelistedGlobs.description: Comma-separated list of file globs to always format on save. Takes precedence over excluded globs. If non-empty, only matching files will be formatted.

isDisabledIfNotInPackageJson.title: Require Prettier in Dependencies
isDisabledIfNotInPackageJson.description: Only format on save when `prettier` is in your project's `package.json` dependencies.

isDisabledIfNoConfigFile.title: Require Prettier Config
isDisabledIfNoConfigFile.description: Only format on save when a Prettier config file (`.prettierrc`, `prettier.config.js`, or `prettier` key in `package.json`) is found.

ignoreNodeModules.title: Ignore `node_modules`
ignoreNodeModules.description: Skip files inside `node_modules` when formatting on save.
